statements: SELECT * FROM patents WHERE patent_owner = 'Company A';
SELECT patent_name, filing_date FROM patents WHERE research_area = 'Biotechnology';
SELECT patent_name, patent_description FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY patent_id DESC;
SELECT patent_name, research_area FROM patents WHERE research_area = 'Software' ORDER BY patent_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE research_area='Technology' ORDER BY filing_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT patent_name, patent_owner FROM patents WHERE research_area='Medical' ORDER BY patent_id ASC;
SELECT patent_id, patent_name, filing_date FROM patents WHERE patent_owner='Google' AND research_area='AI';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2020-01-01' AND filing_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_name, patent_owner, research_area FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' ORDER BY research_area, patent_owner DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_title, patent_date FROM patents WHERE patent_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY patent_date DESC;
SELECT owner_name FROM patent_owners WHERE owner_address LIKE '%CA%';
SELECT patent_title, patent_description FROM patents WHERE patent_title LIKE '%technology%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM patents JOIN patent_owners ON patents.patent_id = patent_owners.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE patent_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_title, patent_description FROM patents WHERE patent_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM patent_owners ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE patent_title LIKE '%AI%' OR patent_description LIKE '%AI%';
SELECT patent_title, patent_date FROM patents ORDER BY patent_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_title, patent_owner FROM patents;
SELECT patent_title, patent_abstract FROM patents WHERE patent_filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patent_inventors ORDER BY inventor_name ASC;
SELECT inventor_name, inventor_affiliation FROM patent_inventors WHERE patent_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_title, patent_filing_date FROM patents WHERE patent_owner = 'Google';
SELECT inventor_name, inventor_affiliation, patent_title FROM patent_inventors JOIN patents ON patent_inventors.patent_id = patents.patent_id;
SELECT research_area_name, COUNT(patent_id) AS num_patents FROM research_areas GROUP BY research_area_name ORDER BY num_patents DESC;

SELECT * FROM patents JOIN patent_inventors ON patents.patent_id = patent_inventors.patent_id JOIN research_areas ON patents.patent_id = research_areas.patent_id WHERE research_area_name = 'Machine Learning';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, title, year_published FROM patents ORDER BY year_published DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name, specialization FROM researchers WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT project_title, researcher_name, area_name FROM research_projects JOIN researchers ON research_projects.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id JOIN research_areas ON research_projects.area_id = research_areas.area_id;
SELECT project_title, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE year_published > 2010
SELECT patent_id, title, company_name FROM patents WHERE company_name='Google' ORDER BY year_published DESC

SELECT research_projects.project_title, researchers.researcher_name, research_areas.area_name FROM research_projects JOIN researchers ON research_projects.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id JOIN research_areas ON research_projects.area_id = research_areas.area_id
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE specialization='Machine Learning' AND join_date >= '2020-01-01'
SELECT researcher_name, join_date FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id IN (SELECT researcher_id FROM research_projects)
SELECT patent_id, title, publication_date FROM patents;
SELECT inventor, assignee FROM patents;
SELECT abstract, claims FROM patent_description;
SELECT name, specialization FROM inventors;
SELECT name, industry FROM assignees;
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT title, inventor, assignee FROM patents WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';

SELECT p.title, pd.abstract, ic.classification FROM patents p JOIN patent_description pd ON p.patent_id = pd.patent_id JOIN patent_classifications pc ON p.patent_id = pc.patent_id WHERE p.inventor = 'John Doe';
SELECT i.name, i.specialization, COUNT(pc.classification) AS classification_count FROM inventors i JOIN patent_classifications pc ON i.inventor_id = pc.patent_id GROUP BY i.name, i.specialization;

SELECT a.name AS assignee_name, p.title AS patent_title, pd.claims AS patent_claims FROM assignees a JOIN patents p ON p.assignee = a.name JOIN patent_description pd ON p.patent_id = pd.patent_id WHERE a.industry = 'Technology';
